title: What happen to ip boost
body: What happened to the ip boost that you get for connecting to facebook?

replies.body:
Hi GrainZerker,

The IP Boost will be added during the week of June 1st. To earn it you need to have your "LoL and Facebook accounts linked for all 24 hours of June 1st".

Check out the [news post](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-and-earn-4-win-ip-boost) for more info.
